segments.text: The sheer volume of water cascading from the sink is quite astonishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s not just a drip; it’s a full, continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is flowing right over the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine the damage this will cause to the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a truly messy situation, creating a wide, spreading puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman still hasn't registered a single thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She continues to polish that plate as if nothing is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find her absolute unawareness infuriating in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely absorbed in one small task?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole kitchen will be ruined if this continues for much longer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an unnecessary and easily preventable disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mess is just getting worse with every passing second.
segments.speaker: PAR
